meanings.sent1: The expectational outcome was better than anticipated.
meanings.sent2: Her expectational attitude towards the project helped her succeed.
meanings.sent3: The expectational waiting for the surprise party was thrilling.
meanings.sent4: The expectational atmosphere in the room was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The expectational excitement before the big game was contagious.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or based on expectations.
meanings.sent1: The team's performance was expectational, meeting all goals.
meanings.sent2: The movie's plot was expectational, keeping the audience engaged.
meanings.sent3: The expectational cake turned out to be a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: The expectational journey of life is full of twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The expectational results of the experiment exceeded all hopes.
